util_loads package¶

Parent Class for XFOIL and XROTOR¶

class util_loads.xsoftware.xsoftware¶

Bases: object

Parent of xfoil and xrotor class. This class contains all methods, that are common in xrotor and xfoil class.

The interface is implemented as a Context Manager (ref: https://book.pythontips.com/en/latest/context_managers.html).

run(argument)¶

Basic method that writes all the commands into the input file and makes a line break after every command.

Parameters

argument – XFOIL or XROTOR command. Will be converted to string type.

Returns

Return type

None.

run_array(array)¶

Parses a numpy.array or list into the input file. This method is used for the propeller geometry input.

Parameters

array (np.array or list) – array or list as input.

Returns

Return type

None.

XFOIL¶

class util_loads.xfoil.xfoil¶

Bases: util_loads.xsoftware.xsoftware

The interface class to XFOIL.

XFOIL access works with a context manager:

import util_loads as ux

with ux.xfoil() as x:
    x.run('aero')
    #...
    x.run('quit')

XROTOR¶

class util_loads.xrotor.xrotor(propeller, loadcase)¶

Bases: util_loads.xsoftware.xsoftware

The interface class to XROTOR.

XROTOR access works with a context manager:

import util_loads as ux

with ux.xrotor(propeller= SomeProp, loadcase= 'SomeLoadcase') as x:
    x.run('atmo 0')
    #...
    x.run('quit')
Parameters

  • propeller (Instance of propeller class) – Propeller to take geometry from.

  • loadcase (Key of loadcase in propeller instance) – Loadcase to take parameters from and return results to.

Returns

Return type

None.

arbi()¶

Runs XROTOR’s ARBI command and parses the given propeller geometry.

ARBI   Input arbitrary rotor geometry
Returns

Return type

None.

parse_airfoils()¶

Enters XROTOR’s AERO routine and parses the given propeller airfoil data

.AERO   Display or change airfoil characteristics
Returns

Return type

None.

write_bend()¶

Writes the output of XROTOR’s BEND Routine to textfile and returns results to the given loadcase.

.BEND   Calculate structural loads and deflections
WRIT f  Write structural solution to disk file
Returns

Return type

None.

write_oper()¶

Writes the output of XROTOR’s OPER Routine to textfile and returns results to the given loadcase.

.OPER   Calculate off-design operating points
WRIT f  Write current operating point to disk file
Returns

Return type

None.

util_loads.airfoil module¶

Airfoil class.

class util_loads.airfoil.airfoil(airfoil_filename, Re, Ncrit=9, Iter=200)¶

Bases: object

The airfoil class.

Parameters

  • airfoil_filename (string) – Name of airfoil coordinate file stored in ‘airfoil-database’ folder.

  • Re (int or float) – Reynolds number

  • Ncrit (int or float, optional) – Ncrit value for XFOIL which affects Transition. The default is 9.

  • Iter (int, optional) – Viscous-solution iteration limit. The default is 200.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_polar(alpha_start=- 20, alpha_stop=20, alpha_inc=0.25)¶

Calculate airfoil polar and store as pandas dataframe.

Parameters

  • alpha_start (int or float, optional) – first alpha value (deg). The default is -20.

  • alpha_stop (int or float, optional) – last alpha value (deg). The default is 20.

  • alpha_inc (int or float, optional) – alpha increment. The default is 0.25.

Returns

Return type

None.

coordinates¶

Return Dataframe of airfoil coordinates

Returns

Return type

DataFrame

static interpolate(airfoil1, airfoil2, fraction_of_2nd_airfoil)¶

Return interpolated airfoil of two input airfoils and fraction. This method uses XFOIL’s INTE and GDES routines in the background.

airfoil, profiltropfen, camberline = airfoil.interpolate(airfoil1,
                                                         airfoil2,
                                                         fraction_of_2nd_airfoil)
Parameters

  • airfoil1 (Instance of Airfoil class) –

  • airfoil2 (Instance of Airfoil class) –

  • fraction_of_2nd_airfoil (float 0..1) – Fraction of second airfoil to keep.

Returns

  • DataFrame – The interpolated airfoil.

  • DataFrame – The symmetrical airfoil (Profiltropfen).

  • DataFrame – The camber line.

parameters¶

Return parameters dictionary.

Returns

dict

Return type

string or int or float

Parameters

  • airfoil_filename (string,) –

  • Re (int or float,) –

  • Ncrit (int or float,) –

  • Iter (int) –

  • Cm –
